## Replace FINISH! with YOU WIN or YOU LOSE Based on Result

This code replaces the "FINISH" text when finishing a race with "YOU WIN!" if you win, and "YOU LOSE!" if you lose. It is designed to work only in races.

<details>
<summary>NTSC-U</summary>

```powerpc
C283549C 0000000C
3A4004B5 3E20809C
82318F68 81910B70
2C0C0002 41800014
2C0C0007 4182000C
2C0C0008 40820038
7C701B78 7C719A14
88630B84 3D808078
618C3F98 7D8903A6
4E800421 3A4004B6
2C030002 40820008
3A4004B7 7E038378
5664063E 00000000
```
</details>

<details>
<summary>PAL</summary>

```powerpc
8231D728 81910B70

2C0C0007 4182000C
2C0C0008 40820038
7C701B78 7C719A14
88630B84 3D808078
618CCFA4 7D8903A6
4E800421 3A4004B6
2C030002 40820008
3A4004B7 7E038378
5664063E 00000000
```
</details>
